name: Stantler
author: Yukiko Baba
flavor_text: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.

attacks.name: Terrorize
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, choose 1 of its attacks. That Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Overhead Toss
attacks.effect: If you have any Benched Pokémon, flip a coin. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to 1 of them. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
